body:
The is a glitch where sometimes you may spawn with half a inventory or no inventory. This is a quick post on how to fix it!
----------------------------------------------------{HOW TO FIX}----------------------------------------------------

Step 1:
Press 'E' on you keyboard and open inventory-


Step 2:
Put you mouse in one of the empty slots-
(My mouse isn't showing but you can see it is where the white slot is!)



Step 3:
Click the slot where your mouse is and then you inventory will 'update' and all your items will appear!



That is it a quick easy way of getting you inventory updated! This also works with a furnace i think not sure i haven't tested but come up to a furnace and click it i does the same job!
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Hope it was helpful took about 15 mins to do and i believe the glitch doesn't appear much now but just in case :D

title: Inventory Glitch Fix Â¬

replies.body: The items are there, they are just invisible. Any changes to an inventory will fix the glitch, not just this way.
replies.body_tagged: The items are there, they are just invisible. Any changes to an inventory will fix the glitch, not just this way.

replies.body: Whenever you interact with any item in the hot bar that is invisible, the items will update and appear.
replies.body_tagged: Whenever you interact with any item in the hot bar that is invisible, the items will update and appear.

replies.body: Thanks for making this post James :) I'm sure it'll be helpful.

replies.body:
Thank you. id have to mine a block with my fists before to get my pick to re-appear... never thought of this xD
Thanks again :)
